statements: SELECT * FROM manufacturing_equipment_energy_data ORDER BY equipment_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT equipment_name, energy_consumption FROM manufacturing_equipment_energy_data WHERE energy_consumption > '1000'
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM manufacturing_equipment_energy_data WHERE date_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT equipment_name, energy_consumption FROM manufacturing_equipment_energy_data ORDER BY energy_consumption DESC
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_equipment_energy_data
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_equipment_energy_data WHERE energy_consumption > 100 ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, energy_consumption FROM manufacturing_equipment_energy_data WHERE equipment_name LIKE 'Machine%' ORDER BY energy_consumption ASC;
SELECT AVG(energy_consumption) AS avg_energy_consumption FROM manufacturing_equipment_energy_data;
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_equipment_energy_data WHERE date_time >= '2022-01-01' AND date_time < '2022-02-01' ORDER BY energy_consumption DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, SUM(energy_consumption) AS total_energy_consumed FROM manufacturing_equipment_energy_data GROUP BY equipment_name ORDER BY total_energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, energy_consumption FROM manufacturing_equipment WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT location_name, equipment_name, energy_consumption FROM manufacturing_locations JOIN manufacturing_equipment ON manufacturing_locations.equipment_id = manufacturing_equipment.equipment_id;
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM manufacturing_locations WHERE equipment_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_equipment WHERE energy_consumption > 100 ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT location_name, equipment_name FROM manufacturing_locations JOIN manufacturing_equipment ON manufacturing_locations.equipment_id = manufacturing_equipment.equipment_id;

SELECT location_name, energy_consumption FROM manufacturing_locations JOIN manufacturing_equipment ON manufacturing_locations.equipment_id = manufacturing_equipment.equipment_id WHERE energy_consumption < 50;
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_equipment WHERE energy_consumption BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY equipment_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(location_id) AS total_locations FROM manufacturing_locations;
SELECT * FROM Manufacturing_Equipment;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, manufacturing_date FROM Manufacturing_Equipment;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, energy_consumption FROM Manufacturing_Equipment WHERE energy_consumption > 100;
SELECT equipment_id, manufacturing_date FROM Manufacturing_Equipment ORDER BY manufacturing_date ASC;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM Manufacturing_Equipment WHERE equipment_name LIKE 'Machine%';
SELECT * FROM Manufacturing_Equipment ORDER BY manufacturing_date DESC, energy_consumption
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_cost FROM Equipment_Maintenance WHERE maintenance_cost > 500 ORDER BY maintenance_cost DESC
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, manufacturing_date FROM Manufacturing_Equipment WHERE equipment_name LIKE 'Machine%'
SELECT E.equipment_id, E.equipment_name, U.usage_date, U.usage_duration FROM Manufacturing_Equipment E JOIN Equipment_Usage U ON E.equipment_id = U.equipment_id
SELECT MAX(energy_consumption) AS max_energy_consumption, MIN(energy_consumption) AS min_energy_consumption FROM Manufacturing_Equipment
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer, production_date FROM manufacturing_equipment ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE consumption_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer FROM manufacturing_equipment WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Company';

SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_type FROM manufacturing_equipment JOIN maintenance_logs ON manufacturing_equipment.equipment_id = maintenance_logs.equipment_id WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled maintenance';
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_equipment;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, manufacturer FROM manufacturing_equipment WHERE production_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT e.equipment_name, ec.consumption_value, ec.consumption_date FROM manufacturing_equipment e JOIN energy_consumption ec ON e.equipment_id = ec.equipment_id;
SELECT em.equipment_name, es.status_code, es.status_date FROM manufacturing_equipment em JOIN equipment_status es ON em.equipment_id = es.equipment_id;

SELECT ml.equipment_id, ml.maintenance_type, ml.maintenance_date, ml.maintenance_notes, me.equipment_name FROM maintenance_logs ml JOIN manufacturing_equipment me ON ml.equipment_id = me.equipment_id;
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM manufacturing_equipment WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, energy_consumption FROM manufacturing_equipment WHERE energy_consumption > 100;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM energy_metrics WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM manufacturing_equipment ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM manufacturing_equipment WHERE energy_consumption > 100 ORDER BY energy_consumption ASC;
SELECT e.equipment_name, COUNT(l.log_id) AS total_logs FROM manufacturing_equipment e LEFT JOIN maintenance_logs l ON e.equipment_id = l.equipment_id GROUP BY e.equipment_name;
SELECT m.equipment_id, AVG(m.metric_value) AS avg_metric_value FROM energy_metrics m GROUP BY m.equipment_id HAVING AVG(m.metric_value) > 50;
SELECT DISTINCT et.equipment_id, SUM(ec.cost) AS total_cost FROM energy_costs ec INNER JOIN energy_trends et ON ec.equipment_id = et.equipment_id GROUP BY et.equipment_id HAVING total_cost > 1000;
